alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 1:56AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Broome, southeastern Tioga, western Susquehanna and eastern Bradford Counties through 245 AM EST... At 156 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Owego to Wyalusing. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Conklin, Maine, Rush, Owego, Springville and Port Dickinson. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 2 and 6. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 64 and 75. Interstate 88 between 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
